title: Furnishing deceptive forms
context: [ยง443B-4.63] Furnishing deceptive forms. It is unlawful for any person who is not a registered collection agency to design, compile, or furnish any form knowing that the form could be used to create a belief in a debtor that the person who designed, compiled or furnished the form is a collection agency. [L 1990, c 246, pt of ยง1]
